alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Clark; Fayette; Jessamine; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 5:54PM EDT until August 25 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clark County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Jessamine County in central Kentucky... Bourbon County in central Kentucky... Nicholas County in central Kentucky... Fayette County in central Kentucky... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 554 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paris, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lexington, Nicholasville, Winchester, Paris, Carlisle, Meadowthorpe, Dunbar High School, Thoroughbred Acres, Cardinal Hill and Cadentown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
